name: debug
description: Extract likely related code and context from a log snippet.

outputSchema.parsedError: object - extracted error type, message, file, line
outputSchema.likelyFiles: array - files most likely related to the error
outputSchema.context: object - code context for likely files
outputSchema.suggestions: array - potential fixes or investigation steps

notes: Works with stack traces, error messages, or log snippets
Automatically extracts file paths and line numbers from logs
